description: Describes a channel. For information about MediaTailor channels, see Working with channels in the MediaTailor User Guide.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelState
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the channel is in a running state or not.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the channel was created.

nested_items.name: FillerSlate
nested_items.description: Contains information about the slate used to fill gaps between programs in the schedule.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The name of the source location where the slate VOD source is stored.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The slate VOD source name. The VOD source must already exist in a source location before it can be used for slate.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Outputs
nested_items.description: The channel's output properties.

nested_items.name: DashPlaylistSettings
nested_items.description: DASH manifest configuration settings.

nested_items.name: ManifestWindowSeconds
nested_items.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

nested_items.name: MinBufferTimeSeconds
nested_items.description: Minimum amount of content (measured in seconds) that a player must keep available in the buffer. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

nested_items.name: MinUpdatePeriodSeconds
nested_items.description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) that the player should wait before requesting updates to the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

nested_items.name: SuggestedPresentationDelaySeconds
nested_items.description: Amount of time (in seconds) that the player should be from the live point at the end of the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

nested_items.name: HlsPlaylistSettings
nested_items.description: HLS manifest configuration settings.

nested_items.name: ManifestWindowSeconds
nested_items.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

nested_items.name: AdMarkupType
nested_items.description: Determines the type of SCTE 35 tags to use in ad markup. Specify DATERANGE to use DATERANGE tags (for live or VOD content). Specify SCTE35_ENHANCED to use EXT-X-CUE-OUT and EXT-X-CUE-IN tags (for VOD content only).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ManifestName
nested_items.description: The name of the manifest for the channel that will appear in the channel output's playback URL.

nested_items.name: PlaybackUrl
nested_items.description: The URL used for playback by content players.

nested_items.name: SourceGroup
nested_items.description: A string used to associate a package configuration source group with a channel output.

nested_items.name: PlaybackMode
nested_items.description: The channel's playback mode.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: The channel's tier.

nested_items.name: LogConfiguration
nested_items.description: The log configuration for the channel.

nested_items.name: LogTypes
nested_items.description: The log types.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TimeShiftConfiguration
nested_items.description: The time-shifted viewing configuration for the channel.

nested_items.name: MaxTimeDelaySeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum time delay for time-shifted viewing. The minimum allowed maximum time delay is 0 seconds, and the maximum allowed maximum time delay is 21600 seconds (6 hours).

nested_items.name: Audiences
nested_items.description: The list of audiences defined in channel.
(string) ---
